name: Space Kettle
description:
“The flying kettle powered by tea fuel is the future of humanity.”

Space Kettle is a challenging game where your main and only task is to reach the top of a surreal mountain using the power of the recently developed “Tea engine”. Select the direction of flight, hold the left mouse button, and start conquering new heights. Remember: despite the fact that the tea fuel is constantly replenished, its amount is limited, so use your opportunities wisely. Otherwise, you will feel the bitterness of falling down and constant loss of progress, as well as utter hopelessness. The game is made in the “Over It” genre, which became popular after the release of “Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy” back in 2017.

  • Challenge yourself to reach the top of the unyielding mountain.
  • Journey through the unique map with different locations.
  • Prepare your mental health for constant falls.
  • Fall over and over again, losing all your hope.
  • Accept your fate or keep struggling.
  • And finally, feel like a real Flying Kettle.
